[`Modifier`](Modifier)

## Modifier type

Mod = Cmd on MacOS and Ctrl on other OS Ctrl = Ctrl key for every OS Meta = Cmd on MacOS and Win key on other OS

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type Modifier = 'Mod' | 'Ctrl' | 'Meta' | 'Shift' | 'Alt';
```
